column1: The Purple Pig////I'm not one to hate on hyped restaurants for the sake of not being mainstream.... but wow
column2: I was really disappointed by Purple Pig. Personally
column3: everything just seemed bland. We ordered the crispy pig ears
column5: and ravioletto. The crispy pork ears had us in the first half
column6: but gradually became a sodium overload over the course of the meal. I wish there were more egg or pickled vegetables in the dish to offset the saltiness. The pork shoulder was incredibly bland from the gravy to the meat to the mashed potatoes. I'm a huge pasta fanatic and was let down by the ravioletto
column7: which again tasted very plain despite its rich ingredients. I personally wouldn't take any friends here if they were visiting.
